dao

Interface CompanyDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompanyDBDAO

    public interface CompanyDAO

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCompany(Company company) 
      List<Company> getAllCompanies() 
      Company getCompany(long id) 
      Company getCompanyByName(String name) 
      boolean isNameExists(String companyName) 
      boolean login(String compName, String password)
      This method is invoked by company facade method login(String compName, String password) to check whether such login parameters exist in the system.
      void removeCompany(Company company) 
      void updateCompany(Company company)
      In case of identical information, the update will proceed and no errors will be thrown.

    • Method Detail

      • createCompany

        void createCompany(Company company)
            throws CouponSystemException
        Parameters:
        company - bean which holds the information needed to create the company.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if company already exists, or communication IO failed.

      • removeCompany

        void removeCompany(Company company)
            throws CouponSystemException
        Parameters:
        company - bean which holds the information necessary to remove the company.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if company does not exist or if communication IO failed.

      • updateCompany

        void updateCompany(Company company)
            throws CouponSystemException
        In case of identical information, the update will proceed and no errors will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        company - bean which holds the information of the update.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if company does not exist, or communication IO failed.

      • getCompany

        Company getCompany(long id)
            throws CouponSystemException
        Parameters:
        id - number of the company that will be returned if exists in the system.
        Returns:
        Company bean that holds the information about the company with the requested id number.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if the specified company id number does not exist, or if communication IO failed.

      • getCompanyByName

        Company getCompanyByName(String name)
                  throws CouponSystemException
        Parameters:
        name - of the company that will be returned if exists in the system.
        Returns:
        Company bean that holds the information about the company with the requested name.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if such company name doesn't exist or if communication IO failed.

      • getAllCompanies

        List<Company> getAllCompanies()
                       throws CouponSystemException
        Returns:
        A List that holds all the companies.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if there are no companies in the system or communication IO failed.

      • login

        boolean login(String compName,
              String password)
       throws CouponSystemException
        This method is invoked by company facade method login(String compName, String password) to check whether such login parameters exist in the system. In case they do, the method returns true; false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        compName - the name of the company.
        password - the password of the company.
        Returns:
        true if such login exists; false otherwise.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if specified company name doesn't exist, if the name and password don't match or if communication IO failed.

      • isNameExists

        boolean isNameExists(String companyName)
              throws CouponSystemException
        Parameters:
        companyName - name of the company.
        Returns:
        true if such name exists; false otherwise.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if communication IO failed.
